Super Missile acquired!

Brilliant Attire:

Transform Sphere:
Morph Ball acquired!
Press &image=SI,0.70,1.0,F1FA8D68; to activate Morph Ball mode. Use the Control Stick to move the Ball around.
Additional data downloaded to Inventory Screen. Press START to access the Inventory Screen.
Transform Spherical Explode:
Transform Sphere Bomb acquired!
While in Morph Ball mode, press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,D523DE3B; to drop a Morph Ball Bomb.
Additional data downloaded to Inventory Screen. Press START to access the Inventory Screen.
Accelerate Orb:
Boost Ball acquired!
While in Morph Ball mode, press and hold &image=SI,0.70,0.68,53B7AC95; to charge the Ball. Release &image=SI,0.70,0.68,53B7AC95; after charging to get a speed boost.
Additional data downloaded to Inventory Screen. Press START to access the Inventory Screen.
Webbed Spheroid:
Spider Ball acquired!
Press and hold &image=A,3.0,D89B9F7C,F6E8276F; when in Morph Ball mode to attach to Spider Ball tracks.
Additional data downloaded to Inventory Screen. Press START to access the Inventory Screen.
Nuclear Weapons Device:
Power Bomb acquired!
While in Morph Ball mode, press &image=SI,1.0,0.68,3AA65ECD; to release a Power Bomb. Power Bombs can destroy tougher materials than Morph Ball Bombs.
Additional data downloaded to Inventory Screen. Press START to access the Inventory Screen.
Sealed Energy Explosion Growth:
Power Bomb Expansion acquired! 
Without the main Power Bomb item, you are still unable to release Power Bombs.
Energy Explosive Amplification:
Power Bomb Expansion acquired! 
Maximum Power Bomb carrying capacity increased by {Power Bomb}.
Artillery Orb:
Cannon Ball state activated!
While in Morph Ball mode, you are invincible and can instantly kill some enemies by touching them!
You lose this state if you die, quit the game, or enter a Kinetic Orb Cannon.
Missile Binding Growth Locked Away:
Missile Expansion acquired! 
Without the Missile Launcher, you are still unable to fire Missiles.
Rocket:
Missile Expansion acquired! 
Maximum Missile-carrying capacity increased by {Missile}.
Projectile Tossing Machine:
Missile Launcher acquired!
Press &image=SI,1.0,0.68,3AA65ECD; to fire. Press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,D523DE3B; to switch back to Beams. Missiles can destroy some Blast Shields on doors.
Additional data downloaded to Inventory Screen. Press START to access the Inventory Screen.
Skeaka Launcher:
Seeker Launcher acquired! 
Press and hold &image=SI,1.0,0.68,3AA65ECD; to charge the Seeker. Move the targeting reticule over targets to lock on.
Additional data downloaded to Inventory Screen. Press START to access the Inventory Screen.
Caged Query Catapult:
Seeker Launcher acquired! 
Press and hold &image=SI,1.0,0.68,3AA65ECD; to charge the Seeker. Move the targeting reticule over targets to lock on.
Missiles can only be used after collecting the Missile Launcher.
Additional data downloaded to Inventory Screen. Press START to access the Inventory Screen.
Grippy Launch:
Grapple Beam acquired!
Press and hold &image=SA,3.0,1.0,1.0,967A3516,304DEF5A; to fire the Grapple Beam. Release &image=SA,3.0,1.0,1.0,967A3516,304DEF5A; to stop grappling. 
Additional data downloaded to Inventory Screen. Press START to access the Inventory Screen.
Cosmic Leap Footwear:
Space Jump Boots acquired!
Press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,53B7AC95; to jump. While still in the air, press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,53B7AC95; again to perform an extra Space Jump.
Additional data downloaded to Inventory Screen. Press START to access the Inventory Screen.
Gravity of Gravity:
Gravity Boost acquired! 
While underwater, press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,53B7AC95; to jump. While moving, press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,53B7AC95; again. Press and hold &image=SI,0.70,0.68,53B7AC95; after that to slowly rise in the water.
Additional data downloaded to Inventory Screen. Press START to access the Inventory Screen.
Twist Assault:
Screw Attack acquired! 
Press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,53B7AC95; to jump. While in the air, press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,53B7AC95; again to Space Jump. Press &image=SI,0.70,0.68,53B7AC95; repeatedly after that to Screw Attack.
Additional data downloaded to Inventory Screen. Press START to access the Inventory Screen.
